name: SEGA AGES Out Run
description:
The 3D driving game that launched a legacy returns on Nintendo Switch™!
Featuring new motion controls, newly added music tracks, and a new
ranking system.

Speed through the streets of SEGA AGES Out Run, the award-winning title
that paved the road for the racing genre. Your favorite stages and
soundtrack are back. Do you have what it takes to beat the clock?
